types:type.name: create-user-record-input-meta
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type create_user_record_input_meta = {| first_name: String, last_name: String, email: String, date_of_birth: String, password: String |} {"example": "{\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"first name\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"last name\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"user@email.com\\\",\\\"date_of_birth\\\":\\\"YYYY-MM-DD\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"password\\\"}"}

types:type.name: input-meta-for-user-table
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type input_meta_for_user_table = {| first_name: String, last_name: String, email: String, date_of_birth: String, password: String, date_of_joining: String, account_status: String, email_verification_status: String |} {"example": "{\\\"first_name\\\":\\\"Rajesh\\\",\\\"last_name\\\":\\\"kanojia\\\",\\\"email\\\":\\\"rajesh@yopmail.com\\\",\\\"date_of_birth\\\":\\\"1988-05-22\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"hash_password\\\",\\\"date_of_joining\\\":\\\"2022-06-24\\\",\\\"account_status\\\":\\\"inactive\\\",\\\"email_verification_status\\\":\\\"unverified\\\"}"}
